original: They celebrate Christmas with presents.

original: Are you from Tokyo?

original: My pen has run out of ink.

original: You should eat.

original: It's my brother's.

original: Our ultimate goal is to establish world peace.

original: May I take a shower in the morning?
translated: Puis-je prendre une douche le matin ?

original: He walks a lot.

original: She wished for a more relaxing life, but that was impossible under the circumstances.

original: I never said no.

original: You're innocent.

original: It was kind of spooky in the cave.

original: I don't work Sundays.

original: We just couldn't find anything.

original: We gave the car a push.

original: It was raining when we left, but by the time we arrived, it was sunny.
translated: Il pleuvait quand nous sommes partis, mais quand nous sommes arrivés, il y avait du soleil.

original: We can consolidate your savings accounts.

original: Have you seen my coat?

translated: Tom est allé à l'hôpital parce qu'il était malade.

translated: Tout nombre pair supérieur à deux est la somme de deux nombres premiers.

original: I have to see it!

original: You run.

translated: Elle sait faire plus de cent types de pain.

original: You're a filthy liar!

original: I have a spare key to my house hidden outside.
translated: J'ai un double de la clef de ma maison caché à l'extérieur.

original: This isn't a place for kids.

original: May I borrow your eraser?

original: Please hold a moment. I will see if he is back.

original: Flower arrangement is a traditional art in Japan.
translated: L'arrangement floral est un art traditionnel au Japon.

original: Close your eyes and tell me what you hear.

translated: Sur l'assiette, il y avait un morceau de poulet, une pomme de terre et quelques petits pois.

original: Nail the windows shut.

original: I don't know where you are now.

original: We've been waiting all morning.
translated: Nous avons attendu toute la matinée.

original: How old is your oldest son?

original: Is that so?

original: I didn't even know that you had one.
translated: Je ne savais même pas que vous en aviez une.

original: You won't believe it.
translated: Tu ne vas pas le croire.

original: Why did you shoot me?

original: I'm fairly certain that Tom is innocent.
translated: Je suis presque certain que Tom est innocent.

original: He has a chubby face.
translated: Il a une tête joufflue.

original: Please be careful.

original: I can prove it to you.

original: Be more flexible.

original: If you see his house, you'll know that he is poor.

original: Are those for me?

original: That's why I lied.

original: I'm taking tomorrow afternoon off.

original: I take my hat off to you!

original: I have a few French books.

original: You are twice as strong as I.

original: She loves gardening.
translated: Elle adore jardiner.

original: My mother is in the kitchen.
translated: Ma mère se trouve dans la cuisine.

original: It is very pleasant to cross the ocean by ship.
translated: Il est très agréable de traverser l'océan par bateau.

original: I am injured.

original: First, I should hear both sides.

original: And, without waiting for an answer, she left the apartment, preceded by her friend Adele.
translated: Et, sans attendre de réponse, elle quitta l'appartement, précédée par son amie Adèle.

original: The librarian said we needed to be quiet.
translated: La bibliothécaire nous a dit de rester silencieux.

original: I'm unable to do this.
translated: Je suis incapable de faire ceci.

original: Am I pretty?

original: The rose is one of the first sent to be used in perfumery.
translated: La rose est une des premières senteurs à avoir été utilisée en parfumerie.

translated: On dit qu'il est encore à Paris.

translated: Je suis plombier.

original: He is not too poor to buy a bicycle.

original: I'm so proud of my team.

original: I am deeply grateful to you for your kindness.
translated: Je te suis profondément reconnaissante pour ta gentillesse.

translated: Tous les soldats étaient debout côte à côte.

original: Don't eat too much cake.

original: I'll get you some brandy.

original: I'm not good at sports.

original: I want to eat it.

translated: Elle porte un jean au ras de la moule.

original: I like to study English.
translated: J'aime apprendre l'anglais.

original: He's very nice with her.
translated: Il est très gentil avec elle.

original: What's that bird?

original: All the Arabic-speaking detainees were released by the Algerian regime except the activists for the independence of Kabylia, the Mozabite autonomists and the Chaouis Autonomists. This is nothing new with the racist and criminal Algerian regime, but the worst thing is that the Algerians are supporting their imprisonment!
translated: Tous les détenus arabophones ont été libérés par le régime algérien à l'exception des militants pour l'indépendance de la Kabylie, des autonomistes mozabites et des autonomistes Chaouis. Ce n'est pas nouveau pour le régime algérien raciste et criminel, mais le pire est que les Algériens soutiennent leur emprisonnement !

original: Without sufficient evidence, it was difficult to charge Dan with murder.
translated: Sans éléments de preuve suffisants, il était difficile d'inculper Dan de meurtre.

original: Older women give birth later.
translated: Les femmes plus âgées donnent naissance plus tard.

original: You may as well come with me.

original: Guess who won.

original: Jews are greedy.

original: I don't see a horse, but I see a wolf.

original: He is obsequious to the higher-ups and arrogant towards his underlings.
translated: Il est obséquieux avec ses supérieurs et arrogant vis-à-vis de ses subalternes.

original: Stay here.

original: Smoking is dangerous to health.
translated: Fumer est dommageable à la santé.

original: I used to have one, but it was stolen.

original: Take whichever you want.

original: She is ill.

original: I can't eat this.

original: Open it.

original: She had her handbag stolen.

original: I'm determined to carry out this plan.

translated: Devrais-je le rapporter à la police ?

original: That's no longer allowed.
translated: Ce n'est plus autorisé.

original: It became difficult to find buffalo.
translated: Il devint difficile de trouver des bisons.

original: You look like a baboon.
translated: Tu ressembles à un babouin.

original: The water came up to my knees.
translated: L'eau arrivait au niveau de mes genoux.

original: Here is the bill.
translated: Voici la note.

original: Can you rub my back?
translated: Pouvez-vous me masser le dos ?

original: We're strong.
translated: Nous sommes forts.

original: The apple doesn't fall far from the tree.
translated: La pomme ne tombe pas loin du tronc.

original: We filled the pitcher to the brim.
translated: On a rempli la cruche à ras bord.

original: Everywhere he goes, he tells a lie.
translated: Partout où il va, il raconte un mensonge.

original: Both girls have blue eyes.
translated: Les deux filles ont les yeux bleus.

original: The situation is getting worse by the day.
translated: La situation empire de jour en jour.

original: A wedding is an endless headache.
translated: Un mariage est une prise de tête sans fin.

original: No credit cards are accepted.
translated: Aucune carte de crédit n'est acceptée.

original: Can you sit in the Lotus position?
translated: Peux-tu t'asseoir dans la position du lotus ?

original: I've rarely seen her so quiet.
translated: Je l'ai rarement vue aussi calme.

original: Sami informed Layla of Farid's past.
translated: Sami informa Layla du passé de Farid.

original: The box is too heavy to carry.
translated: La boîte est trop lourde à porter.

original: Tom now faces criminal charges.
translated: Tom fait maintenant face à des accusations criminelles.

original: Tom is as tall as Mary.
translated: Tom est aussi grand que Marie.

original: Don't forget to put out the fire.
translated: N'oubliez pas d'éteindre le feu.

original: I walk.
translated: Je marche.

original: Excuse me, but I didn't order this.
translated: Excusez-moi, mais je n'ai pas commandé ça.

original: Do other planets exist, on which life can exist?
translated: Existe-t-il d'autres planètes sur lesquelles la vie puisse exister ?

original: The Algerian generals are the gods of Algeria.
translated: Les généraux algériens sont les dieux de l'Algérie.

original: The law is the same for everyone.
translated: La loi est la même pour tous.

original: He took charge of the firm after his father's death.
translated: Il a pris le contrôle de la compagnie après la mort de son père.

original: He has a son and two daughters.
translated: Il a un fils et deux filles.

original: Tom knows Mary's address.
translated: Tom connaît l'adresse de Mary.

original: Don't come any closer.
translated: Ne vous approchez pas davantage.

original: I can't find the bread.
translated: Je ne trouve pas le pain.

original: I don't think it's safe to swim here.
translated: Je ne pense pas que nager ici soit sûr.

original: There's a rumor going around.
translated: Une rumeur circule.

original: Soon gotten soon spent.
translated: Aussitôt gagné, aussitôt dépensé.

original: The clock has stopped.
translated: L'horloge s'est arrêtée.

original: Tom wanted to dance with Mary.
translated: Tom voulait danser avec Marie.

original: I eat to live.
translated: Je mange pour vivre.

original: We're studying French.
translated: Nous étudions le français.

original: But that's not the only reason for his arrest.
translated: Mais ce n'est pas la seule raison pour laquelle il a été arrêté.

original: I can't accept this theory.
translated: Je ne peux pas accepter cette théorie.

original: You are three centimetres taller than me.
translated: Tu es trois centimètres plus grand que moi.

original: The seats are all sold out.
translated: C'est complet.

original: What kind of things do you enjoy doing?
translated: Quelle sorte de choses appréciez-vous de faire ?

original: The air was polluted by exhaust gas.
translated: L'air était pollué par les gaz d'échappement.

original: I want to know more about your school life.
translated: Je veux en savoir plus à propos de votre vie d'étudiant.

original: That's a secret I can't tell you.
translated: C'est un secret que je ne peux pas te dire.

original: The lawyer eats the avocado.
translated: L'avocat mange l'avocat.

original: Every language is equally precious and dear to its speakers.
translated: Chaque langue est également précieuse et chère à ses locuteurs.

original: I hope your brother is better.
translated: J'espère que votre frère se porte mieux.

original: You're a very selfish person.
translated: Vous êtes une personne très égoïste.

original: You'll know the truth one day.
translated: Tu sauras la vérité un jour.

original: The pay is terrible and the hours are long.
translated: Le salaire est misérable et les heures sont longues.

original: I'm not free to go this afternoon.
translated: Je ne suis pas libre de mes mouvements cet après-midi.

original: I'm OK with having just one friend.
translated: N'avoir qu'un ami me convient.

original: Tom is unambitious.
translated: Tom n'est pas ambitieux.

original: He is apparently responsible for it.
translated: Il est responsable, semble-t-il.
